data.title: Daylight Saving Time Changes 2024 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Spain
data.meta_description: Daylight Savings Time 2024 in Spain – Barcelona – Barcelona. When does time change? Date of the next clock change and exact time to spring forward or fall back.
data.text:
31. Mär 2024 - Daylight Saving Time Started

When local standard time was about to reach

Sonntag, 31. März 2024, 02:00:00 clocks were turned forward 1 hour to

Sonntag, 31. März 2024, 03:00:00 local daylight time instead.

Sunrise and sunset were about 1 hour later on 31. Mär 2024 than the day before. There was more light in the evening and less light in the morning.

Also called Spring Forward, Summer Time, and Daylight Savings Time.

More info:

DST Start in Europe 2024

27. Okt 2024 - Daylight Saving Time Ends

When local daylight time is about to reach

Sonntag, 27. Oktober 2024, 03:00:00 clocks are turned backward 1 hour to

Sonntag, 27. Oktober 2024, 02:00:00 local standard time instead.

Sunrise and sunset will be about 1 hour earlier on 27. Okt 2024 than the day before. There will be more light in the morning and less light in the evening.

Also called Fall Back and Winter Time.
